name: event-note
description: Minimal app to use authentication information from IAP.
author: Google LLC

scripts.crawler: set NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0&& set rejectUnauthorized=false&& node --unhandled-rejections=strict crawler/npmexecute.js
scripts.crawlsummary: set NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0&& set rejectUnauthorized=false&& node --unhandled-rejections=strict crawler/npmexecute.summary.js
scripts.cheerio: set NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0&& set rejectUnauthorized=false&& node --unhandled-rejections=strict crawler/cheerio/index.js
scripts.crawl:noval: set NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0&& set rejectUnauthorized=false&& node --unhandled-rejections=strict crawler/npmexecute.noval.js
scripts.crawl:chapter: set NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0&& set rejectUnauthorized=false&& node --unhandled-rejections=strict crawler/npmexecute.chapter.js
scripts.crawl:allnewchapter: set NODE_TLS_REJECT_UNAUTHORIZED=0&& set rejectUnauthorized=false&& node --unhandled-rejections=strict crawler/npmexecute.newchapter.js
